archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1012
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to save events to my calendar, such as a pre-sale go live

properties.value: [CLM] Currently not OOTB, this type of feature can be delivered as customization, for one of the projects we've implemented pre-order feature allowing customers to order exclusive products from loyalty app/web, can be also handled as passing over API information around such information so that external or Comarch delivered app can display it on callendar. in a calendar being a part of SC? might be realized by registering an activity visible on timeline with future date in general we didn't approach such functionality as a personal calendar in SC

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
